job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s Degree in a Business (Finance/HR) related field

secondary: Ability to work with State of Georgia Agencies
all: Ability to work with State of Georgia Agencies

jd:
From: Rahaman Mohammed, Techgene Solutions mohammed.r@techgene.com Reply to: mohammed.r@techgene.com Please find the JD below:

GA DHS NextGen Business Analyst (750078)
Atlanta, GA | Web Cam Interview Only| Remote for time being | Locals preferred

Skill Required / Desired Amount of Experience
Bachelor’s Degree in a Business (Finance/HR) related field. Required
Experience Business Analyst. Required 7 Years
Experience across the SDLC, including requirements, design, development, testing, documentation, training, deployment, operations, support, and main

Nice to have Ability to work well with business unit SME's, Business Analysts, vendors, and end users in cross-functional teams.

Required Experience working with State of Georgia Agencies.

Nice to have

Job Duties
At the direction of the Project Manager the BA will:
Establish Stakeholder Register
Assisting in scheduling and facilitating agency project meetings
Assist stakeholders take the necessary actions/steps to achieve the goals and objectives of the project.
Assists in coordinating project activities
Assists in developing test plans
Assists stakeholders with test scripts
Documents and distributes meeting minutes
Identifies and defines business requirements by quickly understanding business process requirements based on the input and opinions of a diverse group of users
Works closely with Project manager to maintain project artifacts
Develops and maintains a productive working relationship with project sponsors, vendors, and key clients.
Documents agency business requirements in a suitable format that communicates the specific actions developed for the product and obtains appropriate approvals.
